events.message: We have received your application for the Senior Software Engineer position submitted this morning. Thank you for applying.
Your application has been categorised under Engineering roles, specifically for software development and backend services.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will be reaching out to schedule an initial screening to discuss your skills and experience.
The initial screening has been completed successfully, our recruiter was impressed by your background in software engineering and development.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming availability for the technical interview scheduled next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10, 2024 at 10:00 AM UTC with our lead software engineer.
